title: Why isn't the game loading?
body: I tried re starting the client but it wont load the client game. I have a feeling Riot is gonna ban me or give something that isn't my fault. When we were in champ select it loaded to this but no client into the game. Here is the image:(Link)

replies.body: I'm happy to help here, but I first want to just say:  I love your Summoner name!  :X  Okay, geeking out aside, it looks like you're having some issue with your network reaching the game server.  It's certainly possible that your account can receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty if you have a history of leaving games.  Your best bet to prevent this and get back in game may be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Hopefully that does the trick!
Thank you, I got it working :)
